title: CodeBook
description: CodeBox is a powerful platform designed to streamline and enhance coding collaboration. Whether you're working on a group project conducting coding interviews or simply want to code with friends, this tool is here to assist you.

title: Product3D
description: Experience the perfect fusion of creativity and fashion on our 3D T-shirt website, where ecommShop and customers come together through customizable designs and captivating 3D aesthetics

title: Food Hunt
description: An innovative food ordering application, similar to Swiggy, utilizes Alan AI to automate tasks and enables you to conveniently place food orders based on your location.

title: Zencode
description: Zencode is a platform that offers a visual representation of how encryption and decryption work through the use of the Huffman coding algorithm. It also provides a visual representation of the tree used for encrypting and decrypting your file content.

title: MacOS
description: As a child, I had a deep affection for macOS and as I'm now learning development, I aspire to create my own web-based macOS series. This series will include features for listening to music, handling spreadsheets, a whiteboard, a recent menu feature, and captivating animations, much like the macOS experience.

title: Excel Book
description: I added a 'Formula Bar' to the app using Stacks and Graphs, making it super smart. Imagine having many sheets of digital paper at your disposal, just like a bunch of colorful notepads. And guess what? I also made sure the app can spot cycles in the data, like a detective solving mysteries. So now, it's not just any app; it's a super cool, super-smart, and super-sleuth app that's ready for action!

title: DevOverflow
description: Welcome to DevOverflow, a platform packed with advanced features! Standouts include a unique post recommendation system and AI-generated answers. Global database data-fetching ensures swift content delivery, while a playful Badge & Reputation System adds extra flair. With Views and Voting Mechanisms, plus Filter and Pagination options, the user experience is top-notch. Crafted with Next.js and cutting-edge techniques, it offers a seamless, feature-rich environment. Join us in shaping the future of collaborative programming learning!
